title: website: ERROR: certificate common name \u201c*.googleusercontent.com\u201d doesn\u2019t match requested host name \u201cstorage.googleapis.com\u201d.
body:
by **kevin.dankwardt**: 
The website for downloading go has a https URL but there is a problem with the
certificate.

ERROR: certificate common name \u201c*.googleusercontent.com\u201d doesn\u2019t match
requested host name \u201cstorage.googleapis.com\u201d.


From page: https://golang.org/dl/
